channel.title: Some Questions help please :wub:
channel.description:
1. how can i make my barrage that you will stand still for like 20 secs? same with entangle. tbh someone got the code for the bind? :p
2. how to chanse the max hit of range and melee?
3. How can i make it that the max stat is 99 and max cb 126?
4. How can i stop massclicking or cant i stop that???
5. how set autoban on noclip/setitem Please help me :wub:

item.title: Some Questions help please :wub:
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

here for changing max cb and stats

go to client.java
search this

public int getXPForLevel(int level) {

it show u this

[code]public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

change this into 99 into wat stats u want till

return 99

Read full topic
